## 77. MARRY (AS MAN)
### Definition
To enter marriage from the perspective of a woman. (Concepticon)Transitive verb, often expressed by an idiomatic construction. Intransitive ‘marry’ with a plural subject may be different; context no. 3 is included to differentiate between the two.

### Contexts
1 (СВ). After her husband died, Patimat married Magomed. 2 (НСВ). In our village girls get married when they are 19.
